duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support for sales technology and applications.
Evaluate third-party commercial solutions and vendors for the implementation of new technical solutions.
Write user stories, evaluate test cases, and create customer/user-facing documentation for the responsible product areas.
Lead and mentor additional team members assigned to define product offering requirements and gather user feedback/testing.
Evaluate integration opportunities with new internal or external systems and technologies.
Provide reports and presentation views for senior management and the DSD Excellence team to evaluate key performance indicators.
Consolidate feedback, enhancement requests, and beta testing results to prioritize defects and new developments.
Lead and oversee user testing of prototypes, interfaces, and beta version solutions.
Manage and oversee user testing of prototypes, interfaces, hardware, beta version solutions, and other vendor evaluations to achieve product market fit.
Understand and measure usage of the solution to refine operation and future functionality.
Solicit and collect user feedback for inclusion into the derived solution.
Ensure quality of the product through appropriateness of QA test plans and pilot user testing efforts.
Support training, documentation of solution, and implementation activities for solution rollout.
Evaluate integration opportunities with new internal or external systems and technologies as feasible and useful for the user base.
Understand intricate interaction and user flow to translate business requirements into technical requirements, user stories, and epics.
Participate in and lead Agile development ceremonies.
Write epics and user stories to deliver solutions in the Agile process.
Work with operational and other sales teams to test and deploy solutions across the entire sales team, collecting and prioritizing feedback and issues for resolution.
Evaluate third-party commercial solutions and vendors for the implementation of new technical solutions either as stand-alone or integrated to Bimbo Bakeries technical systems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Computer Technology, or related field. A combination of education, training and experience that results in demonstrated competency to perform the work may be substituted.
